abstract: Toasting the Occupy Wall Street movement with some ribbing and some chuckles.
snippet: Toasting the Occupy Wall Street movement with some ribbing and some chuckles.
lead_paragraph: One comedian derided the group of Occupy Wall Street protesters in the front row as Ivy League nerds. Another ridiculed the "mic-check" format of public speaking favored by protesters since they have been prohibited from using bullhorns. Even their nonviolent protest methods came under fire.
